synopsis.text: Nobody was prepared for the unexpected journey that awaited the Nohara family, including their beloved pet, when they awoke from a deep cryogenic slumber to find themselves aboard a mysterious spaceship. Drifting aimlessly through the cosmos, the ship's origins and their reason for being there remained a complete enigma. As they grapple with their newfound circumstances, strange occurrences begin to unfold within the confined quarters of the spacecraft. This suspenseful and comedic tale, set a century into the future, invites you to join Shinnosuke and the rest of the Nohara clan as they navigate the various challenges and adventures that await them in this 'sealed room' anime series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
